Action: # Article Deletion Notifications: Article Deletion Notifications
Setup: As an admin or through the API, delete one or more articles belonging to a publisher.
Setup: Ensure the articles were deleted within the last 7 days.
Log in as the publisher who owned the deleted articles after an hour (scheduler configured to run hourly for testing).

Expected Test Results: A new notification is present with the title "Deleted articles in your journal(s) this week".
The notification content lists the titles and details of the deleted articles.

Action: Verify that if multiple articles were deleted for the same publisher, they are grouped into a single notification.
## No Notifications when no articles deleted
Setup: Ensure no articles have been deleted in the last 7 days (or for a specific set of publishers).

Expected Test Results: No new deletion notifications are received.
